subject: p15131736
Findings: Indwelling support and monitoring devices are unchanged in position. Stable cardiomegaly. Slight improvement in pulmonary vascular congestion. Improving aeration in left retrocardiac region with residual patchy atelectasis remaining. Likely small pleural effusions with some extension into the right minor fissure.
